containerName.description: The name of the container to associate with the load balancer (as it appears in a container definition).

containerPort.description:
The port on the container to associate with the load balancer. Defaults to `0` if not specified.

> **Note:** Specifying multiple `load_balancer` configurations is still not supported by AWS for ECS task set.

loadBalancerName.description: The name of the ELB (Classic) to associate with the service.

targetGroupArn.description: The ARN of the Load Balancer target group to associate with the service.
